import React from "react"; import "./style.css"; import { Helmet, HelmetProvider } from "react-helmet-async"; import { Row, Col, Card, Container } from "react-bootstrap"; import { dataabout, meta, worktimeline, skills, work_experience, } from "../../content_option"; export const About = () => { return ( About | {meta.title}

About me

{dataabout.title}

{dataabout.aboutme}

Work Experience

{work_experience.map((data, i) => { return (
  • ▶ Worked with the platform team, Developed an application to implement an RBAC (Role-Based Access Control) model{" "}
  • {" "} ▶ Utilizing Spring Boot framework and PostgreSQL to replicate the relationships of products, entities, users and roles
  • {" "} ▶ Employed Foreign Key constraint to establish relationship among tables, ensuring data integrity, correctness & efficiency ▶ Developed a variety of APIs in Spring Boot, using SQL queries to facilitate interaction between clients and database ▶ Rigorously tested the developed code using tools like Postman for API testing and pgAdmin4 for database management
); })}
{data.jobtitle} {" "} | {" "} {data.where} {data.date}

{skills.map((skills, i) => { return (

{skills.name}
); })} ); };
